tool_description: Determines student's registration priority and enrollment windows for specified courses based on academic standing and policies.

target_courses.description: Course IDs to check enrollment priority for

error_messages: Student not found: Invalid student ID
Invalid course IDs: One or more courses not found
Invalid semester: Semester not available for enrollment
Priority data unavailable: Cannot determine enrollment priority for student
usage: Provide student ID, target courses, and semester to determine registration priority and enrollment eligibility.

overall_priority_level.description: Student's priority tier: high, medium, or low

registration_window_start.description: Date and time when student can begin registering

registration_window_end.description: Date and time when registration period ends

course_specific_restrictions.description: Any special restrictions or requirements for specific courses

holds_blocking_registration.description: Academic or administrative holds that prevent registration
